collection:
Accordingly, I have developed this
Policy in order for you to understand how I collect, use, communicate and
disclose and make use of personal information.

The following outlines my privacy policy:

Before or at the time of collecting personal information, I will identify the
purposes for which information is being collected.

I will collect and use of personal information solely with the objective of
fulfilling those purposes specified by us and for other compatible purposes,
unless I obtain the consent of the individual concerned or as required by law.

I will collect personal information by lawful and fair means and, where
appropriate, with the knowledge or consent of the individual concerned.
